ygData.subject: RE: Langseax quest?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok...if you give Lysbith Mcnaff 4 wrath orc wristbands she gives you a seax dagger, NOT a Langseax which is the 6 dam 23 dly warrior only axe.....the dagger is
ygData.messageBody:
Ok...if you give Lysbith Mcnaff 4 wrath orc wristbands she gives you a seax
dagger, NOT a Langseax which is the 6 dam 23 dly warrior only axe.....the
dagger is part of the quest for the axe..When I read that all you needed for
the axe was the 4 wristbands from this I knew it was too good to be tru so I
checked eqlizer..sorry to burst anyones bubble....I am going find out what
the real quest is for the axe and when I do I will post it.....

Brennin Lightblade
Lvl 35 barb warrior
Xegony




-----Original Message-----
From: Whitcraft,David [mailto:DWHITCRAFT@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 10:24 AM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Langseax quest?

From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>

I tried this last night. She sai a bunch of stuff about
Gnoll Fangs or
Tooths or something. I'm a Shaman, good faction still (no
Bloodforge quest),
and I gave her 4 orc wrist bands at once and didn't get
anything but text in
return (the same thing about gnolls four times over). No xp,
no trumpets, no
weapons *sigh*.

Do you have to do something else first to get the wrist
bands?

-Leod

-----Original Message-----
From: John A. Williams [mailto:John_Williams@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 3:54 PM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Langseax quest?


From: "John A. Williams" <John_Williams@...>

You can also buy the wristbands from various vendors around
halas
John

-----Original Message-----
From: Whitcraft,David [SMTP:DWHITCRAFT@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 3:53 PM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Langseax quest?

From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>

Orc wrist bands, where do these come from?
Doh...orcs out in
Everfrost?
Fergot about them..been along time since I been to
my homeland. And,
how
rare of a drop are the wrist bands?

-----Original Message-----
From: Beth [mailto:jaguar@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 3:47 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Langseax quest?


From: Beth <jaguar@...>

You go to the pit of doom, there is a warrior
lysbeth something,
she's
the only one actually in the pit, and you have to
give her 4 orc
wrist
bands. You get weapon.

> Jonathan wrote:
>
> Anyone know where in Halas this quest can be
completed and how
hard it
> is? This weapon has pretty damn good stats (6/23
weight 4),
almost
> identical to a silvery war axe and much better
than a combine
weapon.
> It's not lore so it can be dual weald as well.
Any help would be
> appreciated.
